com.aestasit.cloud.aws
[Groovy] Class EC2Client

java.lang.Object
  com.aestasit.cloud.aws.EC2Client

class EC2Client

Client class to interact with Amazon EC2 Instances. The only constructor allows to set the EC2 Region (e.g. eu-west-1). The class provides credentials by looking at the aws.accessKeyId and aws.secretKey Java system properties.

Authors:
Aestas IT

Method Detail

createImage

java.lang.String createImage(java.lang.String instanceId, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, boolean stopBeforeCreation = false, java.lang.Integer stopTimeout = 60, java.lang.Integer retryDelay = 5)
Create an AMI (image) out of an existing instance.
Parameters:
instanceId - the instance id of the instance to create an image from.
name - the name of the AMI.
description - a description of the AMI.
stopBeforeCreation - if true, stop the instance before creating the AMI (reccomended).
stopTimeout - optional, set the number of seconds to wait for the instance to stop. fails if the waiting time exceeds the timeout.
Returns:
the id of the AMI that was created.

java.util.List listAllInstances()
List all available EC2 instances.
Returns:

listInstances

java.util.List listInstances(java.lang.String instanceName, java.util.Map tagFilter = [:])
List all instances with a given name pattern and tags. An example: 
 ec2.listInstances("gramazon*").each {
 ...
  
}
Parameters:
instanceName - the instance name pattern, supports wildcards
tagFilter - the map of additional tag values.
Returns:
collection of instance data.

startInstance

Instance startInstance(java.lang.String keyName, java.lang.String ami, java.lang.String securityGroup, java.lang.String instanceType, boolean waitForStart, int esbVolumeSize = -1, java.lang.String instanceName = null, java.util.Map additionalTags = [:])
Starts EC2 instance.
Parameters:
keyName - the security key name.
ami - the image id.
securityGroup - the security group.
instanceType - the instance type.
waitForStart - if true then method is wating for the instance to become available.
Returns:
an Instance object containing the data of the started instance.

stopInstance

void stopInstance(java.lang.String instanceId)
Stop an EC2 instance.
Parameters:
instanceId - the instance id to stop.

terminateInstances

int terminateInstances(java.util.List instanceIds)
Terminate an EC2 instance.
Parameters:
instanceIds - the list of instance id to terminate.
Returns:
number of terminated instances.
